name: Extreme Shooting Range
description:
Are you ready to become the Shooting Range Master? Choose your weapon, aim and shoot!
Fun for everyone, easy to control, difficult to master. Can you hit the bullseye?

Put your shooting skills to the test with this weapon simulator and become the ultimate range shooter ever! Choose your weapon, pick a gun, a sniper or a rifle and let the shooting training simulation begin! In this realistic first person shooter simulation you will go through a real shooting experience by completing challenging levels and missions. Test your luck and become a pro at shooting moving targets, accomplish all missions and set new high scores! Gun games are ready, are you?
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
